channel.title: Need Help With my 508 Client Please
channel.description:
neeed help running my 508 client everytime i run the client i get an error which is given, i'm not a very good coder so all i ask for is slowa individual help, and for you top bare with me. thank you.
[IMG]http://i126.photobucket.com/albums/p106/best456/clienterror.jpg[/img]

item.title: Need Help With my 508 Client Please
item.dc:creator: @sordsmen123 sordsmen123
item.description:
@sordsmen123 wrote:

the jdk is that but its not working…i dont know whats wrong i just got a new jdk and jre. the cache is in right…and i still get this error. i just downloaded some 1s client today at my friends and it worked… but for some strange reason its not working at my house. can some 1 help me???

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With my 508 Client Please
item.dc:creator: @sordsmen123 sordsmen123
item.description:
@sordsmen123 wrote:

okay can u walk me through putting in the cache?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 24, 2009, 02:38:09 pm[/size][hr]nvm that my cache is in. i think my java is right… so idk whats wrong.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 24, 2009, 02:40:39 pm[/size][hr]run bat for client =
@echo off
cd files
java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game1
pause

then my server all run bat =
@echo off
cd …/src
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java
pause

Read full topic

item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

  1. Make sure you have 508 cache.
  2. Make sure you have the specified path correct.
  3. Check your Java.
